feed.title: Track Awesome Django Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome things related to Django

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Mar 17, 2025
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • impostor (‚≠ê160) - Impostor is a Django application which allows staff members to log in as a different user by using their own username and password.

Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • django-removals (‚≠ê63) - Detect deprecated settings variables via convenient system checks
  • django-classy-settings (‚≠ê37) - Class-based settings to keep your environments in order, with easy access to typed environment variables.

Third-Party Packages / Editors

  • django-prose (‚≠ê214) - A lightweight editor for content creation.

Third-Party Packages / Forms

  • django-formtools (‚≠ê850) - For form previous and multistep forms, previously part of Django until 1.8.

Third-Party Packages / Models

  • django-treenode (‚≠ê758) - Abstract model/admin for tree-based stuff.

Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

  • django-celery-results (‚≠ê742) - Celery result backend with Django.
  • django-tasks (‚≠ê612) - A reference implementation and backport of background workers and tasks in Django, based on DEP 14.

Third-Party Packages / Users

  • django-allauth-ui (‚≠ê342) - Better-looking templates for django-allauth.

Projects / Boilerplate

  • django-docker-template (‚≠ê217) - Dockerized Django with Postgres, Gunicorn, and Traefik (with auto-renew Let's Encrypt).
  • wemake-django-template (‚≠ê2.1k) - Bleeding-edge Django template focused on code quality and security.

Projects / Open Source Projects

  • linkding (‚≠ê8.6k) - Self-hosted bookmark manager that is designed to be minimal, fast, and easy to set up using Docker.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Mar 15, 2025
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • django-hijack (‚≠ê1.6k) - Admins can log in and work on behalf of other users without having to know their credentials.

Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

  • django-jet-reboot (‚≠ê471) - Django Jet is modern template for Django admin interface with improved functionality.

Third-Party Packages / APIs

  • dj-rest-auth (‚≠ê1.8k) - Authentication for Django Rest Framework.
  • django-rest-knox (‚≠ê1.2k) - Authentication Module for django-rest-auth.
  • django-rest-framework-simplejwt (‚≠ê4.2k) - JSON web tokens for DRF.
  • django-webpack-loader (‚≠ê2.5k) - Transparently use webpack with Django.

Third-Party Packages / Commands

  • django-click (‚≠ê278) - Write Django management commands using the click CLI library.
  • django-dbbackup (‚≠ê1.1k) - Management commands to help backup and restore your project database and media files.
  • django-typer (‚≠ê211) - Write Django management commands using the Typer CLI library.

Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • django-split-settings (‚≠ê1.2k) - Organize multiple settings files.

Third-Party Packages / Content Management Systems

  • django-cms (‚≠ê10k) - CMS for Django.

Third-Party Packages / ECommerce

  • saleor (‚≠ê22k) - GraphQL-based Django E-Commerce Platform.

Third-Party Packages / Editors

  • django-markdownx (‚≠ê910) - Comprehensive Markdown plugin built for Django.
  • django-summernote (‚≠ê1.1k) - Summernote is a simple WYSIWYG editor.

Third-Party Packages / General

  • django-sql-explorer (‚≠ê2.8k) - Share data via SQL queries.

Third-Party Packages / Logging

  • django-guid (‚≠ê465) - Inject a GUID (Correlation-ID) into every log message in a Django request.

Third-Party Packages / Models

  • django-polymorphic (‚≠ê1.7k) - Django-polymorphic simplifies using inherited models in Django projects.
  • django-recurrence (‚≠ê517) - Utility for working with recurring dates in Django.

Third-Party Packages / Security

  • django-feature-policy (‚≠ê107) - Set the draft security HTTP header Feature-Policy on a Django app.

Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

  • django-redis (‚≠ê3k) - Full-featured Redis cache backend for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Templates

  • django-components (‚≠ê1.4k) - A way to create simple reusable template components in Django.

Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • django-debug-toolbar (‚≠ê8.3k) - Configurable panels to debug requests/responses.
  • django-waffle (‚≠ê1.2k) - A feature flipper for Django.

Third-Party Packages / URLs

  • dj-database-url (‚≠ê1.5k) - Database URLs.

Third-Party Packages / Users

  • django-improved-user (‚≠ê154) - A custom Django user that authenticates via email. Follows identity and authentication best practices.

Third-Party Packages / Views

  • django-vanilla-views (‚≠ê985) - Simpler class-based views in Django.

Python Packages / Views

  • python-decouple (‚≠ê2.9k) - Strict separation of settings from code.

Projects / Boilerplate

  • cookiecutter-django (‚≠ê13k) - A full-bodied starter project, highly customizable.
  • djangox (‚≠ê2.4k) - Batteries included starter project for Pip, Pipenv, or Docker.
  • Falco (‚≠ê387) - Enhance your Django developer experience: CLI and Guides for the Modern Django Developer.

entry.content:

  • django-admin-inline-paginator-plus (‚≠ê58) - A simple way to paginate your inline in Django admin

Third-Party Packages / General

  • iommi (‚≠ê913) - Toolkit for development of CRUD applications without writing HTML or JavaScript.

  • Django for Beginners, Fifth Edition

  • Django CRM Admin (‚≠ê319) - Open source Python CRM built entirely on Django Admin Site.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Jan 04, 2025
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

  • django-admin-dracula (‚≠ê51) - ü¶á Dracula themes for the Django admin.

Resources / Educational

  • Photon Designer - Django tutorials - Django tutorials by Tom Dekan on how to build Django apps simply - from how to build an instant messenger with Django, add instant search, to using Google Drive as a database. Updated regularly.

Resources / Job Boards

  • Django Gigs - This platform caters specifically to freelance and full-time Django developers.

Projects / Boilerplate

  • Blaze.horse (‚≠ê43) - A Django starter kit with reins and saddle included!

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Dec 29, 2024
entry.content:
Projects / Open Source Projects

  • Baserow - Open source no-code database and Airtable alternative built with Django and Vue.js.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Dec 08, 2024
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • django-related-admin (‚≠ê71) - A helper library that allows you to write list_displays across foreign key relationships.
  • django-admin-sortable2 (‚≠ê843) - Generic drag-and-drop ordering for objects in the Django admin interface.

Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

  • django-grappelli (‚≠ê3.9k) - A jazzy skin for the admin.
  • django-jazzmin (‚≠ê1.8k) - Drop-in theme for django admin, that utilises AdminLTE 3 & Bootstrap 4 to make yo' admin look jazzy.
  • django-daisy (‚≠ê257) - A modern django dashboard fully responsive built with daisyui.

Third-Party Packages / Performance

  • django-zeal (‚≠ê145) - Detect N+1 queries with user-friendly error messages

Third-Party Packages / Templates

  • htpy - htpy is a library that makes writing HTML in plain Python fun and efficient, without a template language.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Oct 25, 2024
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin Themes

  • django-unfold (‚≠ê2.7k) - Modern Django admin theme for seamless interface development.

Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • django-content-settings - Easily create and manage editable typed variables directly from the Django admin panel.

Third-Party Packages / General

  • Django-Classy-Doc (‚≠ê43) - Document your own code in the style of CCBV and CDRF.

Third-Party Packages / Mailing

  • django-anymail (‚≠ê1.8k) - Django email backends and webhooks for Amazon SES, Brevo (Sendinblue), MailerSend, Mailgun, Mailjet, Postmark, Postal, Resend, SendGrid, SparkPost, Unisender Go and more.

Resources / Community

  • Local Django Communities Page - Featuring local events all around the world.
  • X (formerly Twitter) - For official announcements on updates, security fixes, etc.

Resources / Videos

  • DjangoTV - Your source for Django conference videos and tutorials.
  • PyVideo - PyVideo is an index of Python related media.

Projects / Open Source Projects

  • OpenContracts (‚≠ê888) - Enterprise-grade document analytics platform that combines automated PDF parsing, vector embeddings, and LLM integration.

entry.content:

  • django-prometheus (‚≠ê1.6k) - Export Django monitoring metrics to Prometheus.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Feb 08, 2024
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Internationalisation (i18n)

  • django-localflavor (‚≠ê882) - A collection of functionality that is useful for particular countries or cultures. Previously a part of the Django core.
  • django-modeltrans (‚≠ê71) - Translate Django model fields in a JSONField.
  • django-modeltranslations (‚≠ê1.4k) - Translates Django models using a registration approach.
  • django-rosetta (‚≠ê1.1k) - Rosetta provides a UI to read and write your project's gettext catalogs within the Django Admin.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Nov 17, 2023
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Templates

  • curlylint - Experimental HTML templates linting for Jinja, Nunjucks, Django templates, Twig, Liquid.
  • django-template-partials (‚≠ê579) - Reusable named inline partials for the Django Template Language.
  • djhtml (‚≠ê607) - Django/Jinja template indenter.
  • djlint - Lint & Format HTML Templates.
  • slippers - Build reusable components in Django without writing a single line of Python.
  • JinjaX - Super components powers for your Jinja templates.

Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • storybook-django (‚≠ê114) - Develop Django UI components in isolation, with Storybook.

Resources / Community

  • Mastodon - For official announcements on updates, security fixes, etc.

Resources / Job Boards

  • Django News Jobs - A Django job board that also aggregates other job boards.
  • Django Jobs - Django jobs posting for hiring Django Python developers.
  • Python.org Job Boards - While not exclusively for Django, this job board is hosted by the official Python website and features a range of Python and Django-related job opportunities.

entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Model Fields

  • django-any-urlfield (‚≠ê51) - An improved URL selector to choose between internal models and external URLs.
  • django-colorfield (‚≠ê654) - Color field for django models with a nice color-picker widget.
  • django-streamfield (‚≠ê128) - Simple StreamField for plain Django admin (based on Wagtail CMS StreamField idea).

Third-Party Packages / Models

  • django-lifecycle (‚≠ê1.4k) - Declarative model lifecycle hooks, an alternative to Signals.
  • django-mptt (‚≠ê2.9k) - Modified Preorder Tree Traversal; working with trees of Model instances.

Third-Party Packages / Performance

  • pyinstrument (‚≠ê7.2k) - Call stack profiler for Python, Django, Flask, FastAPI.

Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • django-fakery (‚≠ê114) - An easy-to-use implementation of Creation Methods for Django, backed by Faker.

entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

Third-Party Packages / APIs

  • django-rest-framework (‚≠ê29k) - Web APIs for Django.

  • djaq (‚≠ê80) - An instant remote API to Django models with a powerful query language.
  • drf-yasg (‚≠ê3.5k) - Automated generation of real Swagger/OpenAPI 2.0 schemas from Django REST Framework code.
  • graphene-django (‚≠ê4.4k) - GraphQL for Django.

entry.title: Awesome Django Updates on Jul 04, 2020
entry.content:
Third-Party Packages / Admin

  • django-import-export (‚≠ê3.2k) - Django application and library for importing and exporting data with admin integration.
  • django-loginas (‚≠ê370) - "Log in as user" for the Django admin.

Third-Party Packages / Async

  • channels (‚≠ê6.3k) - Async support for Django.
  • starlette (‚≠ê11k) - ASGI framework.

Third-Party Packages / Commands

  • django-extensions (‚≠ê6.7k) - Custom management extensions, notably runserver_plus and shell_plus.

Third-Party Packages / Configuration

  • confidential (‚≠ê76) - Manage configs and secrets (with CLI support).
  • django-environ (‚≠ê3.1k) - Environment variables.
  • django-constance (‚≠ê1.8k) - A Django app for storing dynamic settings in pluggable backends (Redis and Django model backend built in) with an integration with the Django admin app.

Third-Party Packages / Content Management Systems

  • mezzanine (‚≠ê4.8k) - CMS framework.
  • puput (‚≠ê654) - Blog app features with Wagtail.

Third-Party Packages / ECommerce

  • django-shop (‚≠ê3.3k) - Django-based shop system.
  • shuup (‚≠ê2.3k) - Django E-Commerce Platform.
  • django-oscar (‚≠ê6.4k) - Domain-driven e-commerce for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Files/Images

  • django-cleanup (‚≠ê1.2k) - Zero configuration file/image removal for local and remote files.

Third-Party Packages / Forms

  • django-crispy-forms (‚≠ê5.1k) - DRY Django forms.
  • django-widget-tweaks (‚≠ê2.1k) - Tweak form field rendering in templates.
  • django-autocomplete-light (‚≠ê1.8k) - Add autocompletion to forms.

Third-Party Packages / Model Fields

  • django-model-utils (‚≠ê2.7k) - Django model mixins and utilities.
  • django-money (‚≠ê1.7k) - Money fields for forms/models.
  • django-phonenumber-field (‚≠ê1.5k) - Model/form field for normalized phone numbers.

Third-Party Packages / Models

  • django-taggit (‚≠ê3.4k) - Simple model tags.
  • django-reversion (‚≠ê3.1k) - Version control for model instances.

Third-Party Packages / Performance

  • django-perf-rec - Keep detailed records of the performance of your Django code.
  • New Relic - Time middleware, views, and SQL queries.
  • django-query-profiler (‚≠ê141) - Django query profiler to help resolve N+1 queries.
  • py-spy (‚≠ê14k) - Sampling profiler for Python programs.

Third-Party Packages / Search

  • django-haystack (‚≠ê3.7k) - Modular search for Django.
  • django-watson (‚≠ê1.2k) - Full-text search plugin.

Third-Party Packages / Static Assets

  • django-storages (‚≠ê2.9k) - A single library to support multiple custom storage backends for Django.
  • django-compressor (‚≠ê2.8k) - Compress JavaScript/CSS into a single cached file.
  • easy-thumbnails (‚≠ê1.4k) - Image thumbnails for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Task Queues

  • beatserver (‚≠ê142) - A periodic task scheduler for Django.
  • django-rq (‚≠ê1.9k) - Integration for Redis Queue.
  • celery (‚≠ê27k) - Robust and broker-agnostic task queues for bigger, performance-focused projects.

Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • pytest-django (‚≠ê1.5k) - Use pytest features in Django.
  • django-test-migrations (‚≠ê555) - Test django schema and data migrations, including migrations' order.
  • django-test-plus (‚≠ê626) - Useful additions to Django's default TestCase.
  • factory-boy (‚≠ê3.7k) - Test fixtures replacement.
  • model-bakery (‚≠ê908) - Object factory for Django (rename of legacy Model Mommy project).

Third-Party Packages / URLs

  • urlman (‚≠ê122) - A nicer way to do URLs for Django models.
  • django-robots (‚≠ê474) - This is a basic Django application to manage robots.txt files following the robots exclusion protocol, complementing the Django Sitemap contrib app.

Third-Party Packages / Users

  • django-allauth (‚≠ê10k) - Improved user registration including social auth.
  • django-organizations (‚≠ê1.3k) - Multi-user accounts for Django projects.
  • django-cas-ng (‚≠ê390) - Django-cas-ng is Django CAS (Central Authentication Service) 1.0/2.0/3.0 client library to support SSO (Single Sign On) and Single Logout (SLO).

Third-Party Packages / Views

  • django-braces (‚≠ê2k) - Reusable, generic mixins.
  • django-extra-views (‚≠ê1.4k) - Extra class-based generic views.
  • django-stronghold (‚≠ê399) - Makes all your Django views default login_required.

Python Packages / Views

  • bleach (‚≠ê2.7k) - Sanitize your inputs/forms.
  • black (‚≠ê40k) - Uncompromising Python code formatter.
  • coveragepy (‚≠ê3.2k) - Code coverage measurement.
  • huey (‚≠ê5.6k) - A little task queue for Python.
  • nplusone (‚≠ê1k) - Auto-detect n+1 queries.
  • pillow (‚≠ê13k) - Python Imaging Library.
  • pytest (‚≠ê13k) - Testing framework.
  • python-slugify (‚≠ê1.5k) - Returns unicode slugs.
  • sentry-python (‚≠ê2k) - Error reporting SDK.

Resources / Official Resources

  • Documentation - Comprehensive documentation for all Django versions.
  • Polls Tutorial - Build a polls tutorial while learning Django internals.
  • Source Code (‚≠ê84k) - Hosted on GitHub.

Resources / Community

  • IRC Channel - Chat with other Django users at irc://irc.freenode.net/django.

Projects / Boilerplate

  • sos-django-template (‚≠ê24) - Django starter template with separate dev and production settings.

Projects / Open Source Projects

  • pythonic-news (‚≠ê537) - Hacker News clone.
  • Zulip (‚≠ê23k) - Open-source team chat.
  • Django-CRM (‚≠ê2.1k) - Open Source Python CRM based on Django.
  • django-job-portal (‚≠ê603) - Job portal application using Django.
  • Built with Django - Curated list of awesome Django projects.

Wagtail / Wagtail Resources

  • Wagtail Source Code (‚≠ê19k)
  • awesome-wagtail (‚≠ê2.1k)
